channel.title: Comments on: Online Eclipse configurator and download
channel.description: Web development notes and commentary from Ryan Stille

item.title: By: Cindy
item.dc:creator: Cindy
item.description:
I agree, Yoxos is awesome. I also came across a free product called Pulse, made by the same guys who do MyEclipse.
I actually think it's superior, since it not only configures downloads, but manages your plugins and makes them sharable easily. Anyway, worth a look for sure. They even have pre-made profiles ready to run for CFEclipse!
www.poweredbypulse.com
Best, Cindy
item.content:encoded:
I agree, Yoxos is awesome.
I also came across a free product called Pulse, made by the same guys who do MyEclipse.

I actually think it’s superior, since it not only configures downloads, but manages your plugins and makes them sharable easily. Anyway, worth a look for sure. They even have pre-made profiles ready to run for CFEclipse!

http://www.poweredbypulse.com/

Best,
Cindy
